title: Chapter 16
content: O cool is the valley now And there, love, will we go For many a choir is singing now Where Love did sometime go. And hear you not the thrushes calling, Calling us away? O cool and pleasant is the valley And there, love, will we stay.

book.title: Chamber Music
book.description: 简介： Strings in the earth and airMake music sweet;Strings by the river whereThe willows meet....
